title: League bug

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I need help. There is a bug on league that prevented me from loading into the game in between champ select and ingame and I wasn't able to get into the game and it got remade. Then my account got 20 minutes for no reason. I need help. I even reported a bug to on the report the bug page, but idk how long it would take before riot would respond to it.

replies.body: Is there anyway I can at least get rid of my 20 minutes games or lower the minutes or something like that?

Did this result in a black screen?  It sounds like your network might be having problems or is blocked from reaching the game server.  I suggest running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  The [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) also has an option to auto-configure firewall settings to help.

Be sure to test it in a custom game, though, to prevent anymore penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
